div.p: Curia gilde tenta per matheum fichet prepositum de Aberdene in pretorio eiusdem die

Eodem die Nicholaius Fichet Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde
huius burgi ad Requestam specialem mathei fichet tunc prepositi ex gratia consilij
qui solitum prestitit Juramentum / et plegio pro eo

Item eodem die Johannes de spens Receptus fuit ex gratia communis consilij in liberum
burgensem huius burgi qui solitum prestitit Juramentum plegio pro eo .

Memorandum that the xij day of September the yer' forsaid it was decretit and ordanit be
the commoune counsaile and divers' of the merchandez of this burgh' that matheu fichet
Aldirman and Richard of Ruthirfurd' sal pass' for the lousyng and recoueryng
of the schippes merchandez and gudez the quhilkis arr' now of new tane of
new by Inglismen And because thai haue considerit that this is a commoune
action thai haue ordanit the coste of the said passage to be made of the commoune
purs' of this ton'
Curia tenta per prepositum antepenultimo die mensis Septembris Anno supradicto

Quo die de consensu communis consilij Johannes Kymedy filius quondam thome
Kymedy burgensis huius burgi Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem
gilde huius Racione libertatis paterne prestititque solitum et consuetum
v s' Juramentum Et dedit in alba bursa v s'

Eodem die Johannes philipson' filius quondam philippi Andree Receptus fuit
in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi Racione libertatis paterneatis paterneatis
v s' prestito solito Juramento Et dedit in alba bursa v s'

Item eodem die Willelmus fichet filius quondam nicholai fichet Receptus fuit in liberum
burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi Racione libertatis paterne prestito solito
Juramento Et dedit in alba bursa v s' plegio

Item eodem die Johannes littstar' de consensu diuersorum communis consilij Receptus fuit
in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi prestito solito Juramento
Et dabit pro libertate sua iij li' vj s' viij d' plegio pro eo

It is sene speidfull to the Counsale / that fra hyne furth / thair' be ordanit
and chosin twa men of gude cunnyng and knawlage / mastirez of the
Commoune werk of the toune / the quhilkis sal raise all the Rentaile
of the toune / except the Rentaile that the balyes sal haue / to free
anirly the pensiones of the toune / And thai sal dispone that gude
apon the commoune werk of this toune / at the device and as it sall
be sene speidful to the aldirman and the commoune counsaile / Swa
that the aldirman that beis for the tyme sal entromet with' na
commoune gude / bot anerly it that cummys of his office / of the quhilk
he sall mak lele and trew acompt to the Commounes
And quhasaeuer happynnis to be put furth' at litez to be chosin
aldirman / or he pass' furth' he sall swere / to keip this statute /
and alsua to keip and ger' be kepit at all his gudely powar'
the settyng of the wattirez made now laste

Curia gilde tenta in pretorio per Johannem de marr' Juniorem prepositum die veneris proximo post
festum beati michaelis archangeli videlicet die quinta mensis Semp
Septembris Octobris
Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo quadragesimo secundo . Quo die secta vocata
et curia affirmata absentes et cetera

Eodem die subscripte persone electi fuerunt in consiliarios communes huius burgi
pro vno anno et cetera
Johannes de fife
Johannes vaus
gilbertus meignes
Ricardus Ruthirfurd'
Matheus fichet
a Johannes de scrogs pater
Johannes voket pater
a Duncanus de clat
a Andreas culane
a Simon blabre
Stephanus balrony
a thomas blyndseil
Johannes blyndseil
alexander de kintor
a Alexander de camera
a Willelmus scherar'
Andreas ayncroft
a thomas de craufurd'
Johannes de scrogs filius
Johannes voket filius
patricius de badenach'
Walterus giffard
Johannes gray
Willelmus de spaigne
Johannes henrison' culane
Rogerus Williamson'
Johannes henrison' senior

Item eodem die Johannes vaus et matheus fichet electi fuerunt in magistros
communis fabrice et depositarios huius pro vno anno

Item it is ordanit be commoune consaile that na man of this toune / quhat euer he be
herbery ony man of without the toune / bot in continent ha sall cum to
the aldirman and lat him with wit of y how mony persounez and qu
persounes thai arr' / vndir the payne of law and bannysyng And give
happyn to doo ony schath' thair' herbryourez sal be callit and hal
art and parte

Item that na grete mater belangand the Comunitee salbe concludit b
+ thar' be present of the Counsaile xiij persounes at the leeste
officiarez / and he that is of counsaile and beis summond' to
and cummys noght he sal be secludit fra the counsaile for

Item al man that has neth bak yettez close thaim swa that thair' cum na skath'
throu thaim to the toune vndir the payne of acht schillingez / and at thai
lok thair' foryettez within viij dayes vndir the sammyn payne

Item that al the Comunytee alsweile vnfree as free man be sworne to
Rise with' the aldirman and balyeis in the defence of the toune and of
the nychborez of the toune / And quhasa will noght Ryse and absentis
him' willfully he sal tyne his fredome and be bannysit oute of the ton'

Item that the balyeis keipe the assis' of brede ale and flesche / And at thair'
be nane ale sald derrar' than vj d' and at nane brew that bot brethir
of the gild / And othiris sell for iiij d' iij' d' and ij d' // And the penny
lafe wey xxiiij vnc' of bakin brede at the leste / and forthirmar' to
mak a pais' as the cause Requiris / And at the baxtarez baake na
faigez / And at thai see to prisyng of flesche at and at the price
be kepit vndir payne of law

+ Item that na nychbor' by talch' to send in flandris na for to tap agayne
bot anirly til serue til his propre vs' vndir the payne of xl s' to the
commoune werk and eschetyng of the gude .

Item magister Johannes cadyow receptus fuit in liberum burgensem
et confratrem gilde racione libertatis paterne qui solitum prestitit
iuramentum quamquam asseruit quod antea liber fuit et dedit
quinque solidos in bursa alba

Robertus Irwyne inuenit Johannem de scrogs filius plegium legalem quod Andreas Walkar'
fergusius de Skene erunt indempnes de se aliter quam via Juris et cetera // Et idem fergusius
inuenit plegium Andream Duncanson' et quod comparebit ad calumpniam dictj Roberti cum fuerit
legittime premunitus
Curia gilde tenta per Johannem de marr' prepositum secunda die mensisThis could be either November or December. Anno supradicto
Quo die Willelmus Coly conuictus fuit per confessionem propriam de forisstallacione pellium

Thir'This may be from a different date. craftez vndirwrittin sal fynd yerly' in the p offerand of our' lady at candilmes thir'
persounes vndirwrittin that is to say
the littistarez sal fynd
the empriour' and twa doctourez / and alsmony honeste squiarez as thai may
the smythez and hammermen sal fynd
the three kingis of Culane and alsmony honeste p squiarez as thai may
the talyourez sal fynd
our' lady / Sancte bride Sancte helene Joseph' and alsmony squiarez as thai may
the Skynnarez sal fynd
twa bischopes / four' angelez / and alsmony honeste squiarez as thai may
the webstarez and walkarez sal fynd
Symion and his disciplez' and alsmony honeste squiarez et cetera
the G Cordonarez sal fynd
the messyngear' and moyses / and alsmony honeste squiares et cetera
the fleschowarez fynd
twa or th four' wodmen and alsmony honeste squiares et cetera
the brethir' of the gilde sall fynd
the knyghtez in harnace / and squiarez honestely araijt et cetera
the baxstaris sal fynd
the menstralis and alsmony honest squyaris as thai may

QuiaThis entry and the following may be from a different date. Willelmus scherar' restrinxit in manu sua firmam suam pro feodo filij sui dudum
prioris et pro x s' quos dicit se exposuisse in offeratorio in festo purificacionis
beate marie virginis ac pro quinque solidis pro labore suo et quibusdam lapidibus positis
super aqueductum huius burgi // Consilium decreuit quod idem Willelmus soluet et satisfaciet
balliuis de firma sua exceptis dictis x s' et v s' que allocantur sibi hac vice

Item quia idem Willelmus conquerebatur quod Robertus filius suus non habuit aquas aliquam
partem aquarum et pecijt in vltima assedacione / consilium imposuit sibi cilencium
in illa materia pro eo quod mille aque Reperiuntur vocantes

Item consilium decreuit et ordinauit quod Willelmus spaigne satisfaciet Waltero giffard
pro duabus celdris calcis quas emit et recepit ab eodem Waltero ad portam

Item decretum fuit et concessum per consilium quod dominus Johannes modane capellanus seruiet
et Remanebit ad altarem beati ninianij Duthaci confessoris usque ad festum penthecostes
proximo futuro

Simon blabre John' of fyff
William Wokat John the Wauss'
John' henrison' Thom blindzell
Will scherrar John' blindzell
John' henrison' eldar' Robert Sprunt
Dawy clerk Robert Williamson'
Will of spanye Adam nicollson'
John Kyntor John blac'
Robert of chawmer Robert blindzell
Anent the iij lib' giffwyn be
mathw fichet to John' of
scrogis the fadder of the contri
buchion in brettan'

It is sene speidful to the commoune Counsaile and the gilde for the kepyng and
the governance of this burgh' that the yattez at arr' vp be stekit ilke nyght
and in continent the Remanand of yattis and othiris opin placez of the toune
be stekit and closit and at the aldirman do this with' the eraste pennyes that
may be gottyn of the Comoune Rentaile

Item that this burgh' sal be wachit ilke nyght with' thretty men at the
leeste / als lang tyme as the cuntreth' is in trubble // and ony man
that beis warnyt be the officiarez of the toune to the waiche and he
compeir' noght at the our' / he sall tyne on forgiffin viij s' to be
raisit to the commoune werk of this toune / And ony man waicheman
that slepis in the nyght or Removis fra the waiche quhill the son Rise
sal pay vj d' to the seriande And at the waicheman be sufficiently
boddin with' harnace and wappynnys . And at na cuntreth' men be
Ressavit to the waiche

Item because that the balyeis arguet and said thai suld raise the hale Rentaile
of the toune sen thai haue a generale commissioune the counsaile has ordanit
and decretit that the balyeis have anerly sic a propit Rentaile as thai
had of befor // And the Remanand salbe Raisit at the will of the
Counsaile to the commoune werk of the toune // gilbert meignes John'
of fife John' of scrogs matheu fichet John voket androw ayncroft
John gray Williame scherar' patrik badenach' alexander Kintor John
henrison' culane John scrogs filius adam nycholson' thomas craufurd'
Simon blabre thome blyndseil Duncane of clat Walter giffard
John vaus Stephanus de balrony John Wood Williame spaigne

The xvj day of Januar' the Comon' consale puttis scilence to Willam scherar' and to
mastir John' of Caydow apon the sext parte of j net of the northwattir and a sext parte of
the Crois and thai haue ordanit the Aldirman in the name of the Comonis to entromet with'
the said wattiris quhil thai be avisit tharvpon

Curia gilde burgi de Abirdene tenta per Johannem de marr' prepositum die xxvma
mensis Januarij Anno Domini et cetera xlijo

It is ordanit be the Consale that mastir John' of Caydow sal ger put in the net agan in continent in the
watir in to the ply as he fand it of befor' of Adam of hyllis and at the said net
remayne vndistrublit of Mastir John' vndir the aldirmanis recognicion' til it be determit
be the consale

It is decretit be the Comon' consale that for the supprise that mastir John' of Caydow did
in the outtakyn of adam of hillis net sal cum with his bruthir befor' the consale and
sit downe on his kneis and his bruthir to gyddir and ask the aldirman in the name
of the comownis forgiffnes and the said mastir John' sal pay to kyrk werk
xl s' vnforgiffin the quhilkez the aldirman sal ressaue and deliuer to the mastiris
of the kirk werk and he sal entir the personis at war' with' hym at the outtakyn
of the net to the aldirman this ilk day

And it is ordanit be the hale consale in presence of the lord of Drum that giff ony man
dois sik lik case in tyme tocum that he sal pay sik lik payne vnforgiffin and
tyne his tak to

p.hi: de Marr prepositi Anno Domini et cetera xlij

div.p: a Johannes stephani filius thome stephani confratris gilde receptus fuit pro v s' j d' ob' in bursa
a Thomas Riburn Racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro v s' j d' ob' in alba bursa

a Johannes Adamson' filius ade de archery confratris gilde pro v s' j d' ob' Et maritabit
filiam vnius confratris gilde huius burgi plegio tam pro libertate quam pro alijs dicto patre suo

a Walterus lyndesay libere receptus fuit per Requestum domini Ingramj Episcopi Aberdonensis et cetera
plegio pro vicinitate eius Duncano de Clat .

Willelmus banerman' de Kynguddy filius Dauid banerman confratris gilde
receptus fuit pro v s' in bursa in fraternitatem gilde huius burgi

Andreas atkynson' filius Johannis atkynson' confratris gilde receptus
fuit pro v s' in bursa in fraternitatem gilde

Alexander de Irwyne filius domini alexandri de Irwyne domini de Drum militis receptus fuit
in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi racione libertatis paterne pro v s'

Die lune xxiij die mensis Septembris Anno Domini Millesimo CCCCmo xliijo
Andreas philpson de mar receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem
gilde et soluet iij lib' vj s' et viij d' plegius pro solucione dicte summe Johannes ogson

Eodem die Robertus mason receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde
pro v s' j d' ob' racione paterne libertatis

Andreas thomson' qui ante fuit burgensis tantum Receptus in liberum burgensem confratrem
gilde huius burgi prestito solito Juramento / et dabit xxvj s' viij d'

Thomas traile filius Johannis traile confratris gilde Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem
et confratrem gilde et dedit v s' in alba bursa et cetera

Willelmus bird Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde in fauorem alexandri
moyses confratris gilde cuius filiam desponsauit . et prestetit solitum Juramentum
et dedit v s' in bursa / et si contingat ipsum procurare in posterum diuorcium
soluet communitatj x li'
Andreas de marr' Receptus fuit Racione paterne libertatis pro v s' in alba bursa
